Name: Creamy Vanilla Colada
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with a dusting of chocolate powder.
Review: Creamy yoghurt married with aged rum and richly flavoured with vanilla.
History: Inspired by the classic Pina Colada, this was created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Piña Colada history and recipes
Nutrition: One serving of Creamy Vanilla Colada contains 279 calories
